mapper.select: select jan_name2col_num from planocycle.sku_name_config where company_cd = #{companyCd} and class = #{paragraph}
select jan_item2col_num from planocycle.sku_name_config where company_cd = #{companyCd} and class = #{paragraph}
select COALESCE(kokyaku,0) as kokyaku ,COALESCE(intage,0) as intage from planocycle.sku_name_config where company_cd = #{companyCd} and class = #{paragraph}
